---
title: "Using mapview"
teaching: 10
exercises: 2
---

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(mapview)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
```

```{r, message=FALSE}
inat <- read_csv("data/inat-observations.csv")

```


```{r}
map_locations <- st_as_sf(inat, coords = c("longitude", "latitude"), crs = 4326)
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = map_locations)
```



```{r}
map_data <- inat %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c("longitude", "latitude"),   crs = 4326, remove=FALSE) 


mapview(map_data)
```
This is end of the map.
